name: NIGHT: A Vampire's Lament
description:
You  are a newborn vampire who was told nothing by the one that made you, except that you must feed and stay in the night.

You start hiding in a mausoleum with your coffin and some gold Crowns, but what you do is up to you, and how you choose to feed- mercifully or as a monster- is as well.

Made in Ren'Py as a prototype for Mini Jam 118. Development and refinement is ongoing.
